name: ThePoint-DailyMarketCall
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: We're here to make economic news simple. It's easy to get lost and distracted with the constant bombardment of "news" from every network and website, so we're here to filter it down for you and provide the stories worth paying attention to. We focus on all relevant macroeconomic information as it pertains to global markets and get straight to the point on what's going to move markets today and into the future.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
